ca.utoronto.utm.assignment1.othello

Class OthelloControllerHumanVSGreedy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.utoronto.utm.assignment1.othello.OthelloControllerHumanVSGreedy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OthelloControllerRandomVSGreedy

    public class OthelloControllerHumanVSGreedy
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P1 to play the computer P2. The computer, P2 uses a greedy strategy.
    Author:
    arnold

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OthelloControllerHumanVSGreedy()
      Constructs a new OthelloController with a new Othello game, ready to play with two users at the console.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Run main to play a Human (P1) against the computer P2. The computer uses a greedy strategy, that is, it picks the first move which maximizes its number of token on the board. The output should be almost identical to that of OthelloControllerHumanVSHuman.
        Parameters:
        args -
